lead_paragraph: After coaching in the minors for 13 seasons and winning five championships, John Anderson was hired as the head coach of the Atlanta Thrashers. Anderson, 41, led the Thrashers’ top affiliate, the Chicago Wolves, to the American Hockey League title.
snippet: After coaching in the minors for 13 seasons and winning five championships, John Anderson was hired as the head coach of the Atlanta Thrashers. Anderson, 41, led the Thrashers’ top affiliate, the Chicago Wolves, to the American Hockey League title.
